name: Mortal Weapon
overview: Mortal Weapon is a side-scrolling science fiction shooter. The action takes place in 2016 during the war with alien creatures. Controlling a titanium spaceship the player has to defeat successive waves of of enemy attacks. The vessel may be equipped with a total of six weapons, depending on the number of gathered discs: Gun (horizontal fire), Side (side rockets), Rocket (rocket fired at an angle of 45 degrees), Missile (powerful missile, but fired a low frequency), Laser and Plasma. The game is divided into a few stages with different landscape and enemies.
